fields.name: txtApprovequote
fields.fieldText:
Approve your Quote!

Valid until {!Get_My_Order.Quote_Expiration_Date__c}!

Total amount: ${!Get_My_Order.Total_Price__c}


Please also confirm your shipping address!

If you are picking up from us please add in your billing address instead!

Sorry, we can not send to a P.O box!

fields.name: Comments_From_PA1
fields.fieldText:
• Your in hands date - {!Get_My_Order.Must_Have_Date__c}
  • We MUST have art & size approval by 2PM EST. - {!Get_My_Order.Close_Date__c}
  • Anticipated transit days- {!Get_My_Order.Opportunity__r.Transit_Days__c}

fields.name: Comments_From_PA
fields.fieldText:
• Price based on - {!Get_My_Order.Opportunity__r.Actual_Number_of_Items__c} PCS
  • Colors on front - {!Get_My_Order.Opportunity__r.Colors_on_Front__c}
  • Colors on back - {!Get_My_Order.Opportunity__r.Colors_on_Back__c}
  • Colors on other - {!Get_My_Order.Opportunity__r.Colors_on_Other__c}
  • {!Get_My_Order.Opportunity__r.Additional_Quote_Notes__c}

fields.name: nothingtodo
fields.fieldText:
Nothing to do right now!

Everything is on track.

fields.name: Invoicetopaytxt
fields.fieldText:
Use Button Below to pay Invoice!

Balance Due: ${!Get_My_Order.Balance_Due__c}

fields.name: TxtBalanceDue
fields.fieldText:
Pay Invoice Here!

Balance Due: ${!Get_My_Order.Balance_Due__c}

fields.name: txtQuoteExpired
fields.fieldText:
It's been a while!


Let's keep this order alive and double check that quote!


Let {!Get_My_Order.Opportunity__r.OPP_Owner__c} know of any updates you have and we will get this order rolling again.

fields.name: txtrequote2
fields.fieldText: Click the Re-Quote button and we will get back to you lickity split!

fields.name: Success_quoteApproved
fields.fieldText:
Perfect! APPROVED!


We can't wait to get your project underway!

screens.name: What_do_we_need_to_change
screens.label: What do we need to change?

fields.name: ltaChangestonotes
fields.fieldText: Leave a note for us here!

textTemplates.name: eBodyQuoteApproved
textTemplates.text: {!Get_My_Order.Owner:User.Name} has approved their quote for {!Get_My_Order.Opportunity__r.Name}

textTemplates.name: EmialQuoteApprovedClient
textTemplates.text:
Hey {!Get_My_Order.Contact__r.FirstName}!,


All systems are a go for launch! Our team is suited up and ready to get things started for your order.


Heres the next set of steps:

  • Our art team will mock your design on your product
  • Youll receive an email to review and approve your mockup
  • Once we receive your approved mockup, well get it set up for production!


Sit back and relax a bit; we got this!


Me again, your loving trusty sidekick,

{!ContactOwner}
